title: Quincy Center - minute walk to T, all utilities included, SS appliance
posting_body: ['The rent includes all of the basic utilities - heat, hot water, and electricity, so you would pay for phone, cable, internet etc.', ' Please note that rent is based on occupancy by one person – if more than one person is to occupy the apartment, a higher rent will apply.', 'This apartment is ideal for someone who does not have a car and needs to be close to transportation - there is also a mall with a supermarket about a 5-minute walk away, and it is only a 5-minute drive to the intersection of Routes 3, 93, and 95 (a.k.a. 128).', ' If you have a car, the building does have a parking lot and off street parking is available, but for one car only.', 'The apartment is on the 1st floor on the southwest corner of an apartment building in Quincy Center.', ' This is a good sized apartment – it is approximately 800 sq.', 'ft.', 'There is carpet throughout (it is a mocha colored carpet, which can appear to be light tan in some of the pictures).', ' The bedroom (11’ x 17’) could almost fit two entire king sized sets.', 'The living room is the same size (11’ x 17’), comes with an air conditioner and has a sliding glass door out to a balcony.', 'The kitchen has a work in area with an electric stove and a refrigerator, and an eat-in kitchen area which would fit a large dining room set.', 'The apartment has a full bath (a tub with a shower) with a linen closet inside of it.', 'The building itself has an elevator, there are security locks on the entrance doors, an intercom system, and coin operated washers and dryers downstairs.', ' There is a parking lot for off street parking, but please note that parking is available for one car only.', 'We do not allow dogs, but some other pets (specifically cats) are acceptable.', 'If you would like more information on the apartment, please send us your email address (please be aware that if you just send through craigslist and do not enter your email address we DO NOT get your email address) along with your name and a phone number where you may be reached at directly during the day.', ' We will not respond to any questions without a phone number (it just is not time efficient to send back and forth when a quick conversation can resolve all issues/questions).', ' Please note that we will not discuss the apartment with 3rd parties -- we will discuss the apartment only with the person who the apartment is for.']
